Class UsersDB

    • Constructor Detail

      • UsersDB

        public UsersDB()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public User register(String username,
                     String password)
        Registers a new User to the database with the given credentials. If the registration was successful, returns the registered User, otherwise returns null. Note that:
        • username must not be already registered;
        • username and password must contains only alphanumerics, '-', '_', and '.';
        • username must be 3 to 50 characters long;
        • password must be 3 to 50 characters long.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User to be registered
        password - the password used by the User
        Returns:
        an User if the registration was successful, null otherwise

      • getUserByName

        public User getUserByName(String username)
        Searches the database for the User named username. If exists, returns the User, otherwise returns null.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User
        Returns:
        the User whose name is username if exists, null otherwise.

      • isRegistered

        public boolean isRegistered(String username)
        Checks if a User is registered.
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the User
        Returns:
        true if registered, false otherwise

      • search

        public List<String> search(String str)
        Searches for User whose usernames contain the string str.
        Parameters:
        str - the string to be searched
        Returns:
        a List of Users
